subject: RE: FW: New User Linked to Existing User using Single-Sign-On
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi there,
No, these notifications will be sent to every user with user management permissions. There is no way to disable them. For users who would prefer not to get them, I would advise having them create a filter in their email provider to either mark them as read, archive them, or delete them altogether upon receipt so they don't get the notification.
 
Thank you for your understanding! 
 
I have edited your account's Daily Digest users to remove those two named individuals. 
 
Stay safe,
Rhianna 
 
 
--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: DEWITT Derek A [ddewitt@eugene-or.gov]
Sent: 6/3/2025, 10:43 AM
To: support@flocksafety.com
Subject: FW: New User Linked to Existing User using Single-Sign-On



All our Admins are receiving the below message for each new user.  We have about 150 people that will be going live over the next week.  Can we get these notices disabled please.

 

Additionally, we are getting Flock Safety Daily Digest emails sent to our chief and city manager.  They can be removed from these daily emails.  Specifically, Skinner and Medary.


Derek

 

Detective D. DeWitt

Financial Crimes Unit

Special Weapons and Tactics Team

Background Investigations Team

Eugene Police Department

300 County Club Road

Eugene, OR 97401

Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

Work Cell � 541-743-6192

 



 

From: hello=flocksafety.com@mail.flocksafety.com <hello=flocksafety.com@mail.flocksafety.com> On Behalf Of hello@flocksafety.com
Sent: Monday, June 2, 2025 9:52 AM
To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov>
Subject: New User Linked to Existing User using Single-Sign-On

 

[EXTERNAL ?]

 

 <https://flock-public-assets.s3.amazonaws.com/flock-safety-dark-green-logo.png> 

 

 

 

Welcome to the Flock

 

A existing Flock user in your organization has connected to single sign on. Please review the following details. 

	
Name: HANNEMAN Brad A 

Email: BHanneman@eugene-or.gov BHanneman@eugene-or.gov  

Role: Street Crimes 

 

	
 

 

 

 

 

Problems or questions?

 

 support@flocksafety.com 



support@flocksafety.com support@flocksafety.com 



 support@flocksafety.com 



+1 (866) 901-1781



 



 

 

To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to support+unsubscribe@flocksafety.com support+unsubscribe@flocksafety.com .
 <https://flocksafety.my.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?oid=00D6g000003tehf&esid=018Pi00000m6xwF&from=ext>
